thread.title: Aaron Hotard
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Aaron Hotard

author: Aaron Hotard
title: Aaron Hotard
text: Euroflorist completly failed me and I will never use them again. When I scheduled the flower delivery on Valentines Day I assumed the delivery would happen on Valentines Day. At 1500 the flowers did not arrive and the tracking link did not work. When I called Euroflorist to ask the delivery status, the only answer I received was the flowers will be delivered today or tomorrow and they have no way to find out and I should just wait. I am completely dissatisfied with Euroflorist and will never use them again and I will not recommend them to anyone.
